# encode(with:)

**Instance Method**

Encodes the region using the specified encoder.

## Declaration

```swift
func encode(with encoder: NSCoder)
```

## Parameters

- **encoder**: An encoder instance to use.

## Discussion

This method throws an exception if the caption region’s [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVCaptionRegion/size] has different units for [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVCaptionSize/width] and [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVCaptionSize/height], or if the units are unrecognizeable.

## Processing regions

- **mutableCopy(with:)**: Creates a mutable copy of a caption region.
- **isEqual(_:)**: Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether an object equals another.
